Scene:
Katsukake Village
(Katsukake mura / 沓掛村)

Play: The Two-Colored Reins (恋女房染分手綱)

Production: February 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanji VI (鶴澤寛治 (六))
